metadata.title: New developments for the design, synthesis and biological evaluation of potent SARS-CoV 3CL pro inhibitors

abstract.original_text: A series of trifluoromethyl, benzothiazolyl or thiazolyl ketone-containing peptidic compounds as SARS-CoV 3CL protease inhibitors were developed and their potency was evaluated by in vitro protease inhibitory assays. Three candidates had encouraging results for the development of new anti-SARS compounds.

sentences.segment_text: A series of trifluoromethyl , benzothiazolyl or thiazolyl ketone-containing peptidic compounds as SARS-CoV 3CL protease inhibitors were developed and their potency was evaluated by in vitro protease inhibitory assays .
Three candidates had encouraging results for the development of new anti-SARS compounds .
